text.section:
To be eligible for financial assistance from the Fund, an applicant shall be:
a local economic development fund that meets the criteria set forth in Part V of this subtitle; or
an individual, private business, not-for-profit entity, or local government, or the Corporation that intends to use the requested financial assistance for a project that:
except as provided in subsection (b) of this section, is in an eligible industry sector under § 5-321 of this subtitle; and
has a strong potential for expanding or retaining employment opportunities in the State.

A project need not be in an eligible industry sector if the applicant:
is located in a qualified distressed county; or
is a local government or the Corporation; and
does not intend to use the financial assistance to carry out a project that benefits a particular private sector entity.
